section.name: openDBcopy Overview

p.b: Designed and developed by Anthony Smith, published under the terms of the GNU General Public License.

section.p: openDBcopy is a universal database utility to migrate data from and to any database given a JDBC driver.

ul.li: Custom plugins can be added and/or developed
Complete migration project saved as XML for easy re-use
Run with GUI or as batch process
